fields.name: Scrying Orb (Trinket)
fields.description: Limited to 1 Trinket. Active: Reveals a small location within 2500 range for 2 seconds. Enemy champions found will be revealed for 5 seconds (120 second cooldown). At level 9, cast range increases to 3500. (Trinkets cannot be used in the first 30 seconds of a game. Selling a Trinket will disable Trinket use for 120 seconds).
